part1_ratings.video_summary: A dashcam video captured a near-miss accident in Canada, near Cornwall, Ontario. The key road event involved a semi-trailer truck performing an unsafe lane change, potentially without signaling or checking mirrors, nearly colliding with another vehicle (possibly a truck) traveling in the adjacent lane. The incident highlights potential traffic rule violations including unsafe lane change, failure to signal, and failure to check mirrors.
part1_ratings.road_event_answer: A semi-truck made an unsafe lane change, nearly colliding with another vehicle.
distractor_answers: A car and a two-wheeler dangerously attempt to overtake on a hairpin bend.
Cyclists, pedestrians, and vehicles are all seen respecting traffic signals and lane markings.
A scooter rider opens the door of a car, causing a passing pedestrian to fall.

captions.text: Near-miss in Cornwall, Ontario: semi-truck’s unsafe lane change almost causes crash with another vehicle. 🚚 #CanadaRoads
I just had a wild near-miss with a semi in Cornwall, Ontario! #trucking

Semi-trailer trucks pulling moves like this—unsafe lane changes, no signal, barely a glance—almost as if mirrors are just for decoration. Near Cornwall, Ontario, another close call caught on dashcam. #RoadSafety #TruckAccidents

part1_ratings.video_summary: A daytime near-miss incident involving dangerous driving behavior was captured by a vehicle-mounted camera in Osaka, Japan. The key road event involved the camera vehicle and a right-turning vehicle. The right-turning vehicle made a sudden and dangerous right turn, nearly colliding with the camera vehicle. This maneuver was likely due to the driver of the right-turning vehicle not paying attention or being impatient, resulting in a failure to yield right-of-way. The incident could have been avoided if the right-turning vehicle had waited for a clear opportunity to turn and checked for oncoming traffic.
part1_ratings.road_event_answer: A vehicle makes a sudden, dangerous right turn, failing to yield and nearly colliding with the camera vehicle.
distractor_answers: A motorcyclist performs high-speed wheelies on a busy road with other vehicles.
A car and a two-wheeler dangerously attempt to overtake on a hairpin bend.
A driver on a highway at night has a near-miss after reacting quickly to an unexpected obstacle.

captions.text: I nearly got hit by a reckless right-turning driver who didn’t even bother to yield. Some people never learn. #drivingfail
Dashcam footage from Osaka captures a tense moment as a right-turning car fails to yield, narrowly missing the camera vehicle. Grateful this near-miss ended safely. 🚗💥 #RoadSafety #DashcamDrama
Was I just supposed to guess that car was about to dart in front of me? Near-miss moments like this really make me wonder… 🚗💥 Anyone else get surprised by these moves? #RoadRage

part3_comparisons.video_summary: The video, captured by multiple cameras including surveillance and indoor types, depicts key road events involving unsafe driving behavior, improper U-turns, and various traffic violations in Hyderabad, India, specifically in areas like Gachibowli and Abdullahpurmet. These events occurred during both daytime and nighttime. The road entities involved include cars, motorcycles, buses, and pedestrians, interacting with U-turns, traffic signals, road dividers, and zebra crossings. Actions observed include improper U-turns, overtaking, speeding, wrong-side driving, and red light jumping. The depicted traffic rule violations encompass improper U-turns, wrong-side driving, red light jumping, speeding, lane discipline violations, and helmet rule violations.
part3_comparisons.road_event_answer: A compilation shows multiple traffic violations in Hyderabad, including improper U-turns, speeding, and red light jumping.
distractor_answers: A car and a two-wheeler dangerously attempt to overtake on a hairpin bend.
A large truck performs a hazardous overtaking maneuver, ignoring oncoming traffic.
A motorcyclist, approaching at high speed, performs a tactical roll to avoid colliding with a turning truck.
part3_comparisons.caption_A: Have you ever seen roads like this in Gachibowli or Abdullahpurmet? 🚦 What goes on here? #Hyderabad
part3_comparisons.caption_B: Have you ever seen roads like this in Gachibowli or Abdullahpurmet? 🚦 What goes on here? #Hyderabad

part3_comparisons.video_summary: A near-miss incident occurred at night near Marathahalli, India, captured by a 4K dashcam. A car, driving straight with the right of way, was almost collided with by a motorcycle. The motorcyclist failed to yield to the car, stopping at the last moment, which constituted a traffic rule violation. It was suggested that the biker might have been rushing to meet delivery targets. The incident could have been avoided if the biker had yielded and both parties had practiced defensive driving.
part3_comparisons.road_event_answer: A motorcyclist fails to yield and nearly collides with a car at an intersection.
distractor_answers: A high-speed car crash on a highway results in a severely damaged vehicle, multiple fatalities, and injuries.
A large truck performs a hazardous overtaking maneuver, ignoring oncoming traffic.
A motorcyclist performs a stunt by standing on the seat of their moving motorcycle.
part3_comparisons.caption_A: @BlrCityPolice Marathahalli got its own Fast & Furious last night—biker’s need for speed almost turned car into a bumper sticker.
part3_comparisons.caption_B: @BlrCityPolice Marathahalli got its own Fast & Furious last night—biker’s need for speed almost turned car into a bumper sticker.

part3_comparisons.video_summary: A massive multiple vehicle crash, involving numerous vehicles including large trucks, cars (such as white cars and a red hatchback), and a police car, occurred on the N12 highway near the Delmas off-ramp in South Africa. The incident took place during the morning or early hours, with poor visibility due to heavy fog identified as the primary cause. Vehicles were observed driving slowly, stopping, or parked, with some trucks illuminating their brake lights. People in high-visibility vests were present, inspecting or interacting with the vehicles. The event was captured by a vehicle-mounted camera, showing perspectives from inside a vehicle and focusing on side mirrors.
part3_comparisons.road_event_answer: A massive multi-vehicle pileup on a highway caused by heavy fog.
distractor_answers: Multiple vehicles run a red light and make illegal U-turns while pedestrians are crossing against their signal.
A car and a two-wheeler dangerously attempt to overtake on a hairpin bend.
A motorcyclist performs a stunt by standing on the seat of their moving motorcycle.
part3_comparisons.caption_A: Morning fog leads to a multi-vehicle crash on N12 near Delmas. 🚨 #SouthAfrica
part3_comparisons.caption_B: Morning fog leads to a multi-vehicle crash on N12 near Delmas. 🚨 #SouthAfrica

part2_intensity_change.video_summary: A severe car accident, captured by multiple cameras, occurred in Brampton, Ontario, Canada. The key road event involved a dark-colored sports car that reportedly came flying over a fence at high speed, resulting in it being severely damaged and overturned with its front end crumpled and debris scattered. The driver and passenger of the sports car fled the scene, constituting a hit-and-run. A white Toyota Tacoma pickup truck was also involved, sustaining a detached front bumper. The incident took place near two-story brick residential houses and power lines. Bystanders were observed assessing the situation and offering assistance. The traffic violations associated with this event include speeding, reckless driving, and fleeing the scene of an accident.
part2_intensity_change.road_event_answer: A sports car crashed at high speed, and the occupants fled the scene.
distractor_answers: An SUV dangerously cuts in front of a truck, forcing the truck to take evasive action.
A beginner driver's car and a yellow car are seen making illegal turns/lane changes at intersections.
A large truck performs a hazardous overtaking maneuver, ignoring oncoming traffic.
part2_intensity_change.caption_A: A car suddenly flips over, sending debris everywhere— so unsettling to watch. People rush away, unsure what just happened. 🚗💥 #Crash #RoadDrama
part2_intensity_change.caption_B: My heart races watching this—out of nowhere, a car comes crashing over a fence, metal everywhere, people running. It’s so overwhelming. #CarCrash 😰

part2_intensity_change.video_summary: A vehicle-mounted camera captured a near-miss incident at night on the M7 highway in Sydney, Australia. The key road event involved the driver's vehicle and possibly a stationary vehicle or unexpected obstacle on the road. The driver demonstrated quick reflexes to avoid a potential collision, motivated by self-preservation and the need for quick decision-making. The incident could have been prevented by maintaining a safe speed, increasing vigilance while driving at night, and being prepared for unexpected obstacles.
part2_intensity_change.road_event_answer: A driver on a highway at night has a near-miss after reacting quickly to an unexpected obstacle.
distractor_answers: A beginner driver's car and a yellow car are seen making illegal turns/lane changes at intersections.
A motorcyclist performs high-speed wheelies on a busy road with other vehicles.
A car and a two-wheeler dangerously attempt to overtake on a hairpin bend.
part2_intensity_change.caption_A: A stitch in time saves nine—always anticipate the unexpected when driving at night. Safety before speed, always.
part2_intensity_change.caption_B: Always stay alert and ready for anything on the road. Quick reactions can make all the difference.

part2_intensity_change.video_summary: A dashcam video captured a key road event of reckless driving and dangerous lane changing at night in Toronto, Ontario, Canada, specifically on Highway 427 South near the Highway 407 exit. An SUV, identified as a Durango, performed a dangerous lane change by passing a truck on the left and then cutting sharply in front of it. The truck driver demonstrated good driving by successfully avoiding a collision. The SUV driver's actions are suspected to be due to impatience and possibly being in a rush after missing an exit. This incident involved traffic rule violations including reckless driving, illegal lane changing, and potentially speeding.
part2_intensity_change.road_event_answer: An SUV dangerously cuts in front of a truck, forcing the truck to take evasive action.
distractor_answers: A scooter rider opens the door of a car, causing a passing pedestrian to fall.
A motorcyclist performs high-speed wheelies on a busy road with other vehicles.
A motorcyclist rides recklessly, weaving between vehicles, riding no-handed, and hiding their license plate.
part2_intensity_change.caption_A: Not sure what I just saw tonight, but I’m honestly a little shaken. #recklessdrivers
part2_intensity_change.caption_B: I witnessed wild driving late last night, October 17. #HighwayLife gets intense sometimes.
